scripts.seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r dotenv/config node_modules/sequelize-cli/lib/sequelize db:seed:all --config=src/db/config.js --seeders-path=src/seeders
scripts.seed-undo: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r dotenv/config node_modules/sequelize-cli/lib/sequelize db:seed:undo:all --config=src/config/config.js --seeders-path=src/seeders
scripts.seed:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r dotenv/config node_modules/sequelize-cli/lib/sequelize db:seed:all --config=src/db/config.js --seeders-path=src/seeders
scripts.seed:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node -r dotenv/config node_modules/sequelize-cli/lib/sequelize db:seed:all --config=src/db/config.js --seeders-path=src/seeders
